text: Not at the moment <@UCBLGCB4L>, the editor is built to be hugely mobile responsive out of the box which requires (for the moment) that we keep content as simple as possible. If we had nested images within content it gets a little complex to properly flow the email on mobile devices.
In saying that, we know that there's a big need here and do want to try and find a way to allow images and tables inside of rich text while also supporting full mobile responsiveness
In tandem though, we're working to bring smart content options to all modules so you'll also be able to have a smart image module and a smart button module, etc
Afraid not, <@UEZJ74UN8>, your best bet would be to segment users into different lists and set up a different newsletter to match the user's interests
I think <#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> might also be a better spot for your question too :+1:
